name: Allen ABNEY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Allen ABNEY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the “Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus/Appropriate Relief’ is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1177
Allen ABNEY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 71 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 2012.
